# Analysis of the distribution
## Victim and Arrest 


```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
Police_arrest_made$`Date of Arrest`

test<-left_join(Incident_reports, Police_arrest_made, by = c("Date of Occurrence"="Date of Arrest"))

`

Table_joint <- test %>%
              select(year.x,`Arrestee's Race`, `Victim Race`) %>%
              filter(`Arrestee's Race`=="Black" | `Arrestee's Race`=="White" ) %>%
              filter(`Victim Race` =="Black"| `Victim Race` =="White")

Table_joint<-Table_joint %>%
  select(-year.x)

library(caret)
confusionMatrix(Table_joint, Table_joint$`Victim Race`,`Arrestee's Race`)
```
